name: Mirex Marketing
description:
Mirex Marketing provides marketing solutions for any business with any budget. We scale and customize our services to meet the needs of the clients we serve. Our solutions are complete, affordable and tailored to serve you, whether you're an individual, small start-up or large established company.
We offer mobile-friendly business websites (responsive Wordpress websites) with all forms of internet marketing, as well as many marketing streams offline and promotional printing.
